name: Small Animal Disinfectant Spray - 500ml
description: A disinfectant, cleaner and deodorant all in one, the spray can be used for where your pets live, sleep and feed, such as hutches, cages, bedding and drinkers. Suitable for small animals.

name: Hyacinth Duo Tunnel - Large
description: Play, sleep and chew this 100% natural Rosewood Naturals Hyacinth Duo Tunnel. The perfect boredom breaker for rabbits, guinea pigs and more. Ideal for filling with bedding and treats these natural tunnels will keep their teeth and claws.

name: Wooden Snack Box Puzzle Toy
description: Mentally challenge your rabbit, rodent or bird with the Trixie Small Pet Wooden Snack Box Small Pet Toy. This wooden game contains three cubes in a holder that you can fill with your small pet's favourite snack.

name: Rodent Playground
description: If you are looking for something to give to your pet that combines treat, toy and gnaw, then the Rosewood Naturals Rodent Playground is the ideal option.

name: Rainbow Play Bridge Small
description: Cute and great fun for your small animal, this wooden Rosewood Rainbow Bridge makes a colourful addition to your pet's cage. It is a great boredom breaker and provides your small furry with something new to explore and play with.

name: Eco Bedding - 15L
description: Tiny Friends Farm Eco Bedding for small pets is a new eco-friendly and sustainable bedding for small pets. It is soft on small petsâ€™ paws and is kind to our planet too. It is ethically sourced and manufactured in Great Britain.

name: Pico Hamster Cage XLarge
description: A must-have for the adventurous hamster or mouse! The Rosewood Extra Large Pico Hamster Cage has four exciting levels for your pet to explore! Starting at the bottom there is an extra deep base, to make your small furry feel more secure.

name: Supreme Stickles Treats - 2 pack
description: Truly yummy for your small animal, these tempting Supreme Stickle Treats are just so tasty! They are bursting with a blend of delicious ingredients and include tasty toppings. Crunchy and fibrous, they stimulate the natural gnawing instinct.

name: Rat & Ferret Cage by PetPlanet
description: With 2 large doors on each level providing easy access, this Rat & Ferret Cage by PetPlanet is a superb, and stylish, dual level cage for rats and ferrets. It is a really strong, superb quality habitat for your small furry friends.

name: Supreme Harry Hamster Tasty Mix - 700g
description: Officially the first and only food to be approved by the National Hamster Council, this well-balanced feed is nutritionally complete and offers a balanced diet.

name: Selective Junior Rabbit Food - 10kg
description: Supreme Science Selective Junior Rabbit Food is a tasty food for junior rabbits that contains extra protein to help support growth and development. It is fortified with a blend of amino acids, vitamins and herbs to provide a great natural source of antioxidants.

name: Boredom Breaker Ferret Activity Tunnel
description: Designed for ferrets and guinea pigs, the Rosewood Boredom Breaker Ferret Activity Tunnel provides your small furry with a stimulating distraction and encourages their natural instincts for tunnelling and hiding!

name: Small Animal Corner Toilet
description: This Rosewood Small Animal Corner Toilet is a useful accessory ideal for homes and hutches. Available in Medium and Large sizes.

name: Pod Carrier
description: This safe and hygienic Rosewood Pod Carrier is the ideal way to transport your precious pet. This pod carrier is also useful for holding your pet whilst you clean their cage.

name: Excel Ferret Nuggets - 2kg
description: Burgess Excel Ferret Nuggets are a complete, nutritionally balanced, tasty food for ferrets. Ferrets are obligate carnivores, which means that they have to eat meat to survive as it contains important nutrients.

name: Animal House Kit
description: This Animal House made by Norfolk Industries for Disabled People comes uncoloured allowing you to personalise the look of your furry friendâ€™s house. It has been designed to engage small children with their pet through colouring.

name: Naturals Apple & Strawberry Bunnies - 100g
description: Rosewood Naturals Apple & Strawberry Bunnies are wonderful, grain free treats that are three steps to heaven for all little furries. Made in a cute bunny shape, the treats contain real apple, strawberry and spinach.

name: Dental Easy Treats for Small Animals - 60g
description: Beaphar Dental Easy Treat is a delicious, nutritional treat for small animals. The Beaphar Dental Easy Treat is crunchy to support the natural wearing of the teeth, has a high fibre content of 22% to help maintain good digestion.
imgAlt: Dental Easy Treats for Small Animals - 60g

name: Options Mini Grooming Set
description: Keeping a small pet always looking adorable is not an easy task. They shed frequently and their coats get matted very easily. But beyond looks, our furry little friends deserve to feel good and comfortable.

name: Snuffle Forage Mat for Small Animals
description: Rosewood Naturals Snuffle Forage Mat for Small Animals is the perfect interactive toy to mentally stimulate your pet and encourage their natural foraging instincts. Made with multiple layers of super soft felt strands
imgAlt: Snuffle Forage Mat for Small Animals

name: Pawsley Cheesey Chicken Sticks Dog Treats - 80g
description: We all know how much dogs love cheese, which is why these Good Boy Pawsley Chewy Chicken Sticks with Cheese Dog Treats are made with super duper tasty 100% natural chicken meat and scrummy dog-safe cheese.
imgAlt: Pawsley Cheesey Chicken Sticks Dog Treats - 80g

name: Dentastix Daily Dental Chew 105 Bulk Pack
description: Pedigree Dentastix Daily Dental Chew are uniquely X shaped dental sticks that are scientifically proven to help reduce tartar build-up by up to 80%, when fed daily. Pedigree DentaStix are designed to be chewed for long enough to be effective.
imgAlt: Dentastix Daily Dental Chew 105 Bulk Pack

name: Adult Dry Dog Food - Chicken & Brown Rice
description: Simpsons Premium Adult Dry Dog Food is a nutritious balanced diet that is suitable for all breeds of adult dogs.Rich in Chicken it is extremely palatable and contains all the necessary vitamins and minerals required for adult dogs.
imgAlt: Adult Dry Dog Food - Chicken & Brown Rice

name: T-Bone Chew Toy - Beef
description: Bamboodles T-Bone shaped chew toys are infused with bamboo making them durable and a challenge for even the most aggressive of chewers.

name: Himalayan Dog Chew - Strawberry
description: YAKERS 100% Natural Dog Chews, made with Himalayan Yak Milk! YAKERS dog chews are suitable for all dogs over 4 months old, and are ideal for serious chewers.

name: Degradable Poo Bags - 100 Bags
description: These degradable poo bags are easy to use as they come with built in handles, and to make things more pleasant they are vanilla scented, helping to make a necessary job less of a chore.

name: Mallard Stuffingless Dog Toy by PetPlanet 50cm
description: With no stuffing to rip out, this fabulous, realistically designed dog toy offers your pet long-lasting play with the shake-ability factor that dogs love.
imgAlt: Mallard Stuffingless Dog Toy by PetPlanet 50cm

name: Gum Gum Bone
description: There is now a safe bone for your canine pal to enjoy. This solid latex Gum Gum Bone will give your best friend hours of fun and it will help clean his teeth!

name: Budget Pet Carrier
description: Manufactured from polypropylene with metal wire doors. Including a standard front opening door, this carrier also features a top opening hatch, which is ideal for removing pets when you donâ€™t want them to run away.

name: Soft Puppy Harness with Lead
description: This Trixie Soft Puppy Harness with Lead set is specifically for puppies of very small sized breeds. It is both kind and comfortable for the new addition to the family as it is made from durable nylon and polyester.

name: Luxury Leather Collar 10-14in
description: Combining quality materials with a timeless design, this Rosewood Luxury Leather Collar is a comfortable and practical fit for your dog. Made from fine leather and suedette material for snugness.

name: Pet Raindrop Premium Pet Fountain - 1.8 Litres
description: Cats and dogs are attracted to moving water and as this filtered water tastes so good, your pet will feel more inclined to drink.
imgAlt: Pet Raindrop Premium Pet Fountain - 1.8 Litres

name: Adult Dry Cat Food - Turkey
description: A complete, hypo-allergenic dry food with selected protein source turkey, it is a dietetic food, excellent for the reduction of ingredient and nutrient intolerances.

name: Fillet Strips - Tuna - 35g
description: These succulent and tasty Tuna Fillet Strips are the quick and easy alternative to simply cooked fish in an instant. They contain no artificial colours or flavours and are made with 100% natural tuna.

name: Cat treats MEGA TUB 350g
description: DREAMIES cat treats are packed full of things cats love. Share moments with your feline friend with these dual-texture treats with an enticingly crunchy outside and a soft inside.

name: Premium Adult Cat Wet Food - Salmon with Chicken
description: The Acana Premium Adult Cat Wet Food Salmon with Chicken recipe is an animal protein-rich pÃ¢tÃ© crafted to completely satisfy your feline.
imgAlt: Premium Adult Cat Wet Food - Salmon with Chicken

name: Regular Fit 32 Adult Dry Cat Food
description: ROYAL CANIN Fit 32 is suitable for adult cats between 1-7 years old, itâ€™s been specially designed to meet all of your catâ€™s nutritional requirements for supporting and maintaining the healthy situation that your cat is currently in.
imgAlt: Regular Fit 32 Adult Dry Cat Food

name: Ultimate Sisal Scratching Post - 83.5cm Height
description: Does your cat claw away at your furniture? This SmartCat Ultimate Sisal Scratching Post allows your cat to stretch up and scratch in the same way.

name: 2-in-1 Antibacterial Cat Litter Box L52 x W37.5 x H42.25cm
description: This incredibly versatile Iris 2-in-1 Cat Litter Box features a pull-out tray at the bottom for tray liners, making it easier for you to change and also save on the cat litter.
imgAlt: 2-in-1 Antibacterial Cat Litter Box L52 x W37.5 x H42.25cm

name: Cat Litter Tray Spray - 500ml
description: A disinfectant, cleaner, and deodorant all in one, the spray will not only kill germs, but it will also eliminate bacteria and other nasty viruses.

name: Catnip Fish Cat Toy - Red
description: The ideal pouncing toy, this Pet Love Catnip Fish Cat Toy will bring out the hunting instincts in your cat.

name: Organic Catnip 1oz
description: Add the irresistible aroma of Yeowww Catnip to your pets toys to bring out the playful puss! This super catnip is made from 100% organically grown catnip.

name: Cat Nibble Critter Catnipillar Cat Toy
description: KONG Cat Nibble Critter Catnipillar Toy appeals to a catâ€™s natural instinctive desire to claw and bat with an easy-grip mesh fabric.
imgAlt: Cat Nibble Critter Catnipillar Cat Toy

name: Treat Ball
description: The Catit Treat Ball encourages your cat to have lots and fun and as a reward they will receive a treat!
